about_the_game:
This is a Touhou derivative RPG.

◆System Traditional dungeon strategy RPG You can explore each dungeon and defeat the boss to advance to the next dungeon.

◆ Characters appearing

Sanae Reimu Sakuya Remilia Fran Patchouli Little Devil Misuzu Cirno Rumia Great Fairy

Alice Marisa Youmu Yuyuko Purple Orange Ai Kaguya Eirin Tei Suzusen Keine Imouto Kurenai

Kanako Suwako Shizuha Joko Hina Nitori Fumi Kana Hatate Tenko Iku

Satori Koishi Sora Parsy Yugi Orin Suika Yuuka Ellie Kurumi Genzuki

Komachi Shiki Eihime Medicine Lily White Saint Nue Hoshi Nazurin Kogasa Murasa

Futo Miko Akyu Rinnosuke Kaogi Mamizou

Mima Yumemi Chiyuri Kamiki Yumeko Sara Mai Yuki Louise

1. You can play quickly with cheat equipment.

2.Last boss and EX with cheat equipment.Some enemies cannot be defeated.

3. Full of playable elements: Collector's item

4. Abundant hidden items (small medal system)

5. A stage with the same dungeon and battle songs appears

◆Treasure box

There are treasure chests that can be revived by fighting through dungeons.

There is a low probability that the treasure chest will contain rare items.

◆System

The concept of this game is an "answer matching game".

In other words, you can't win unless you include a specific character.

You need to use protection skills appropriate for the boss and exploit their weaknesses.

I can't beat it. (with exceptions)

Switch characters each time and choose skills suitable for the boss.

Be sure to include the characters you have.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows8,WIndows9,WIndows10,WIndows11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4GB MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The concept of this game is an "answer matching game". In other words, you can't win unless you include a specific character. Switch characters each time and choose skills suitable for the boss. Be sure to include the characters you have.
